Dirty Check validation decorators
description: Dirty Check allows user to check whether any changes are done to any of the controls of the FormGroup.

title: Prop validation decorators
description: It is used to define a property of a field in the model class.

title: PropArray validation decorators
description: PropArray is used to define an array of the instances of a class.

title: PropObject validation decorators
description: It is used to define an object of thes property of a field in the model class.

title: Conditional Validation validation decorators
description: Conditional validation is used when the user wants to apply validation on the field depending upon the condition of some other field

title: AllOf validation decorators
description: allOf validation  will check whether the user has entered all of the values of given field or not.

title: Alpha validation decorators
description: Alpha validation  will allow only alphabets to be entered. It will not allow any digit or special character.

title: AlphaNumeric validation decorators
description: Alpha Numeric validation  will allow only alphabets and numbers to be entered, It will not allow any special character.

title: Ascii validation decorators
description: ascii validation  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper ascii format.

title: Async validation decorators
description: Async validationwill allow the field to validate the unique value from server for that particular field. This async validation can be customized according to the need.

title: Choice validation decorators
description: choice validation  will check whether the value entered is matching the properties defined.

title: Compare validation decorators
description: Compare validation  will compare two inputs whether they are same or not.

title: Compose validation decorators
description: Compose validationis used to apply multiple validations on a particular field.

title: Contains validation decorators
description: Contains validation  will check that value is in the input, It will not allow to enter input that not contains the predefined value.

title: CreditCard validation decorators
description: creditCard validationwill check property value is creditcardtype or not, It will not allow to enter any value other than credit card format.

title: Cusip validation decorators
description: CUSIP validationwill allow user to enter only nine-character alpha-numeric cusip code. CUSIP numbers are used to identify North-American finantial securities.

title: DataUri validation decorators
description: dataUri validation  allows user to enter the input which is a valid data Uri.

title: Date validation decorators
description: Date validationwill allow user to enter input which is only in the proper date format.

title: Different validation decorators
description: Different validation  will check two inputs whether they are different or not. It is just opposite of compare decorator.

title: Digit validation decorators
description: Digit validation  will allow only digits to be entered, It will not allow any alphabets or special character.

title: Email validation decorators
description: Email validation  will only allow user to enter input which is in the correct email format.

title: EndsWith validation decorators
description: endsWith validation  allows user to enter the input which ends with particular value

title: Even validation decorators
description: Even validation  will check whether the value entered by user is an even number or not.

title: Extension validation decorators
description: extension validation  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper extension format.

title: Factor validation decorators
description: factor validationwill allow user to enter factor of a number which is called dividend.

title: File validation decorators
description: file validation  allows user to validate whether how many files can be uploaded . It depends upon maxFiles and minFiles.

title: FileSize validation decorators
description: fileSize validation  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper file size format.

title: GreaterThan validation decorators
description: Greater than validation  will check that input property is greater than related field input.

title: GreaterThanEqualTo validation decorators
description: Greater than equal to validation  will check that input property is greater than or equal to the related field input.

title: GRid validation decorators
description: GRid validation will allow user to enter only the input in proper GRid format.The Global Release Identifier (GRid) is a system to identify releases of digital sound recordings (and other digital data) for electronic distribution.A GRid consists of 18 alphanumerical characters.

title: HexColor validation decorators
description: HexColor validation  will allow user to enter only the input in proper Hex Color format.

title: Image validation decorators
description: image validation  allows user to validate image like height,width etc .

title: Ip validation decorators
description: ip validationis used to validate the ip address of the device.

title: Json validation decorators
description: json validation  will allow user to enter the input only in proper Json format.

title: Latitude validation decorators
description: latitude validation  allows user to enter value which is valid latitude.

title: LatLong validation decorators
description: latLong validation  allows user to enter the input which is valid Latitude or longitude.

title: LeapYear validation decorators
description: LeapYear validation  will check whether the value entered is a leap year or not.

title: LessThan validation decorators
description: Less than validation  will allow the user to enter only that value which is less than the value in the pre defined field.

title: LessThanEqualTo validation decorators
description: Less than equal to validation  will allow the user to enter only that value which is less than oe equal to the value in the pre defined field.

title: Longitude validation decorators
description: longitude validation  allows user to enter the input which is in the proper longitude format.

title: LowerCase validation decorators
description: lowerCase validation  will allow user to enter only the lowercase alphabets.

title: Mac validation decorators
description: mac validation  will check whether the value entered is a valid mac address.

title: MaxDate validation decorators
description: MaxDate validation  will allow user to enter the date less than the maxDate value parameter.

title: MaxLength validation decorators
description: MaxLength validation  will allow user to enter the input upto the maximum length value parameter.

title: MaxNumber validation decorators
description: MaxNumber validation  will allow user to enter the input upto the maximum number value parameter.

title: MinDate validation decorators
description: Minimum Date validation  will allow user to enter date greater the minimum date value parameter.

title: MinLength validation decorators
description: MinLength validation  will allow user to enter the input length matching the minimum length value parameter.

title: MinNumber validation decorators
description: MinNumber validation  will allow user to enter the input greater than the minimum number value parameter.

title: NoneOf validation decorators
description: noneOf validation  will check whether the user has entered none of the value is selected from the given inputs.

title: Numeric validation decorators
description: numeric validation  will check whether the value entered is a valid numberic value or not.The validation can be set according to requirement, it can be either decimal,negative number or positive number.

title: Odd validation decorators
description: Odd validationwill check whether the value entered is an odd number or not.

title: OneOf validation decorators
description: oneOf validation  will check whether the user has entered any one of the given inputs or not.

title: Password validation decorators
description: Password validation  will allow user to enter only the input according to correct password validation format.

title: Pattern validation decorators
description: Pattern validationwill allow user to enter the input which match the predefined pattern value parameter.

title: Port validation decorators
description: port validation  allows user to enter the input which is a valid port number.

title: PrimeNumber validation decorators
description: primeNumber validation  allows user to enter only prime number.

title: Range validation decorators
description: Range validation  will check that the entered value is in the specified range.

title: Required validation decorators
description: Required validation  will check that the user has entered the value in the property or not.

title: Rule validation decorators
description: Rule validationwill allow the user to set custom rules on a particular field.

title: StartsWith validation decorators
description: startsWith validation  allows user to enter the input which starts with particular value.

title: Time validation decorators
description: time validation  will allow user to enter the input only in the correct time format.

title: Unique validation decorators
description: Unique validationis used to validate unique input based on formArray.

title: UpperCase validation decorators
description: UpperCase validation decorator will allow user to enter the alphabets only in the upperCase format.

title: Url validation decorators
description: Url validation  will check that value entered in the property is in the correct url format or not.
